input.hint: If you can't get a point with the phone, enter the coordinates from the GPS below.

select1.label: Are you at the actual location?

input.label: Bearing:
input.hint: What is the bearing from you to the location?

upload.label: Take a picture
upload.hint: Choose the best photo that represents what is happening

input.label: Photo caption:
input.hint: Describe what is in the photo

Is it inside an existing land title?

select.label: What is the crossing being used for?
select.hint: You can select more than one. Select "other" if you want to add more information

input.label: Describe what the crossing is being used for
How many cattle?
input.hint: How many cattle have been rustled?

input.label: How much was the cattle worth?
Who is doing this or where are they from?
input.hint: If you don't know, leave this blank

select.label: What permission do they have?
select.hint: You can select more than one.

select.label: What land type is affected?
select.hint: You can select more than one.

input.label: Describe what is affected:
input.hint: This is showing because you selected 'other' on the previous screen

select1.label: What type of water is affected?

select.label: What are the impacts?
select.hint: You can select more than one.

input.label: Describe any other impacts
input.hint: This is showing because you selected 'other' on the previous screen

input.label: Anything else you want to add?

select.label: Who are you and who is with you?
select.hint: If someone is also with you that is not on the list, also select "other" below

input.label: Who else are you with?
input.hint: Add the name of your guide(s) here

select1.label: Has the information you have collected been given to the village council?
Has the village council informed you about what they will do?

input.label: Describe what actions they propose to take

select1.label: Does the village council request any action from SCPDA?

input.label: What does the village council want the SCPDA to do?
